coreAttributes.name: Brown Rat's Burger
coreAttributes.description: A double-cheeseburger, wrapped up in greaseproof paper. On the wrapper, there's a picture of a brown-furred rat-boy greedily shoving one of these burgers into his mouth.

effectTooltipLines.line: If body size is less than [style.colourBodySizeThree('large')], increases body size by 1

coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.getOccupation()==OCCUPATION_TOURIST) [##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/5)]

The taste of the burger reminds [npc.name] of home, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot more energetic!

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 4)] #ELSE [##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot more energetic...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)] #ENDIF #IF(npc.getBodySizeValue()<60) [#npc.incrementBodySize(1)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: Unwrapping the Brown Rat's Burger's paper covering, [npc.name] quickly [npc.verb(reveal)] the greasy cheeseburger contained within. Bringing it up to [npc.her] mouth, [npc.she] [npc.verb(take)] a big bite, and [npc.verb(discover)] that it's absolutely delicious. Encouraged by the taste, it only takes [npc.herHim] a few moments to wolf down the meal.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Unwrapping the Brown Rat's Burger's paper covering, [npc.name] quickly [npc.verb(reveal)] the greasy cheeseburger contained within, before offering it to [npc2.name]. Bringing it up to [npc2.her] mouth, [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(take)] a big bite, and [npc2.verb(discover)] that it's absolutely delicious. Encouraged by the taste, it only takes [npc2.herHim] a few moments to wolf down the meal.
